entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Edmonton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:58 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmonton Blatchford 3:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -11.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -14.4°C
Wind: NE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 6

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023
